column4: hmmm ubuntu seems to have poor support for my video card (i cant even change my resolution higher then 1024x768)    should i change window mangers, or what?
what chipset does your video card have

make sure you have the packages "linux-restricted-modules-generic" (assuming you are running the generic kernel) and the linux drivers for you graphics card. srr http://www.intel.com/support/graphics/intel810/sb/cs-009118.htm
